entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
